update FUN_DATASOURCE_CONFIG
DS_CONNECTION_ID = #{dsConnectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVER_IP = #{serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_NAME = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIC_SERVER_IP = #{logicServerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUMP_SERVER_IP = #{dumpServerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update FUN_DATASOURCE_CONFIG set DS_CONNECTION_ID = #{dsConnectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVER_IP = #{serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_NAME = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIC_SERVER_IP = #{logicServerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMP_SERVER_IP = #{dumpServerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMP_SERVER_IP_2 = #{dumpServerIp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMP_SERVER_IP_3 = #{dumpServerIp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_LOGIN_NAME = #{dbLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{dbLoginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOSO_CONN_ID = #{sosoConnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOSO_DB_NAME = #{sosoDbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAFA_CONN_ID = #{fafaConnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAFA_DB_NAME = #{fafaDbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEB_CONN_ID = #{webConnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEB_DB_NAME = #{webDbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTERPRISE_VESION = #{enterpriseVesion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
